lead_paragraph: Telecom Italia is in talks with Vivendi to acquire the French media group's Brazilian broadband unit, and trump a recent bid from Spanish rival Telefonica, sources familiar with the situation said.

headline.main: Telecom Italia in Talks to Snap Up Vivendi's GVT-Sources
headline.print_headline: Telecom Italia in Talks to Snap Up Vivendi's GVT-Sources

snippet: Telecom Italia is in talks with Vivendi to acquire the French media group's Brazilian broadband unit, and trump a recent bid from Spanish rival Telefonica, sources familiar with the situation said....
